comments.creator: gerv@mozilla.org
comments.text:
report.cgi has a "format=simple" template in the repo, which gives you a table of report numbers without the Bugzilla header and footer. However, it is currently inaccessible - using format=simple on the URL doesn't work.

It works if you remove the following line from report.cgi, around line 250:

    $formatparam = '';

However, that may not be the right fix. :-)

Gerv
comments.author: gerv@mozilla.org
comments.raw_text:
report.cgi has a "format=simple" template in the repo, which gives you a table of report numbers without the Bugzilla header and footer. However, it is currently inaccessible - using format=simple on the URL doesn't work.

It works if you remove the following line from report.cgi, around line 250:

    $formatparam = '';

However, that may not be the right fix. :-)

Gerv
